amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 118-59 to require DHS to make publicly available on its website an annual report on the number of illegal aliens deported for assaulting a law enforcement officer.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires DHS to make publicly available on its website an annual report on the number of illegal aliens deported for assaulting a law enforcement officer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 303 - 126 (Roll no. 223).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. Boebert.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 303 - 126 (Roll no. 223).
